pos.question: How do I process a refund?
pos.answer: To process a refund, go to the Sales History section, locate the transaction, click on the Refund button, and follow the prompts to complete the refund process.

inventory.question: How do I update product stock levels?
inventory.answer: Navigate to Products & Inventory > Stock Management, select the product you want to update, and enter the new stock quantity. You can also use the bulk update feature for multiple products.

reports.question: How can I generate sales reports?
reports.answer: Go to Reports & Analytics > Sales Reports, select your desired date range and report type, then click Generate Report. You can export the report in various formats including PDF and Excel.

customers.question: How do I manage customer loyalty points?
customers.answer: Access the Customers > Loyalty Program section, where you can view and manage customer points, set up rewards, and configure point earning rules.
